info.name: Wuxible World
info.description: A nice, clean, and easy on the eyes dark theme for Wuxiaworld. Perfectly makes wuxia legible in any circumstance without burning your retinas :).
info.additionalInfo:
Like this theme? Great! I don't need any thanks, just try and read Stellar Transformations or TDG, I will be happy if you get addicted :)>
If you have any Wuxia/Manga blogs/sites you'd like to see a theme for email "alexandergremory@gmail.com".
